alert.note: Alert for Rush (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 11 at 9:30PM EST until December 12 at 3:55AM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...River flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Indiana, including the following county, Rush. * WHEN...Until 945 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Low-water crossings are inundated with water and may not be passable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 930 PM EST, River gauge report indicated flooding is occurring along the Flatrock River near Raleigh. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain fell late Friday night and early Saturday morning. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly rural areas of Northeastern Rush County - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
